statements: SELECT * FROM backups_and_disaster_recovery ORDER BY backup_timestamp DESC
SELECT backup_id, backup_name FROM backups_and_disaster_recovery WHERE backup_location = 'Local'
SELECT backup_name, backup_location FROM backups_and_disaster_recovery WHERE backup_timestamp >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM backups_and_disaster_recovery WHERE backup_name LIKE '%daily%'
SELECT COUNT(*) as total_backups FROM backups_and_disaster_recovery
SELECT backup_id, backup_name FROM backups_and_disaster_recovery WHERE backup_location = 'Cloud Storage' ORDER BY backup_timestamp DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM backups_and_disaster_recovery WHERE backup_timestamp >= '2021-10-01 00:00:00' AND backup_location = 'Local Disk'
SELECT backup_name, backup_location FROM backups_and_disaster_recovery WHERE backup_timestamp BETWEEN '2021-09-01 00:00:00' AND '2021-09-30 23:59:59' ORDER BY backup_timestamp ASC
SELECT backup_id, backup_timestamp FROM backups_and_disaster_recovery WHERE backup_name LIKE '%Weekly%' AND backup_location = 'Tape Storage'
SELECT DISTINCT backup_location FROM backups_and_disaster_recovery WHERE backup_timestamp > '2021-09-01'
SELECT * FROM BackupSettings;
SELECT backup_id, backup_type FROM BackupSettings WHERE storage_location = 'CloudStorage';
SELECT * FROM RecoveryStrategies WHERE strategy_name = 'Incremental Backup';
SELECT strategy_id, strategy_name, strategy_description FROM RecoveryStrategies ORDER BY strategy_name ASC;
SELECT backup_id, storage_location FROM BackupSettings WHERE backup_type = 'Automatic';
SELECT * FROM BackupSettings;
SELECT backup_id, storage_location, backup_type FROM BackupSettings ORDER BY storage_location DESC;
SELECT strategy_name, strategy_description FROM RecoveryStrategies WHERE strategy_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM RecoveryStrategies WHERE strategy_name LIKE '%backup%';
SELECT backup_id, storage_location FROM BackupSettings WHERE backup_type = 'full' ORDER BY backup_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM backups;
SELECT backup_name, backup_location FROM backups WHERE backup_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT backup_id, backup_name, backup_date FROM backups ORDER BY backup_date DESC;
SELECT strategy_id, strategy_name, strategy_description FROM recovery_strategies WHERE strategy_owner = 'John Doe';
SELECT data_type, protection_level FROM data_protection WHERE backup_frequency = 'daily';
SELECT * FROM backups WHERE backup_id = 1;
SELECT backup_id, backup_name, backup_date FROM backups WHERE backup_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM recovery_strategies WHERE strategy_owner = 'Admin' ORDER BY strategy_id DESC;
SELECT protection_id, data_type FROM data_protection WHERE protection_level = 'High';
SELECT strategy_name, strategy_description FROM recovery_strategies INNER JOIN data_protection ON recovery_strategies.strategy_id = data_protection.protection_id;
SELECT * FROM backup_policies;
SELECT policy_id, policy_name, backup_frequency FROM backup_policies ORDER BY backup_frequency ASC;
SELECT policy_name, retention_period FROM backup_policies WHERE retention_period > 30;
SELECT * FROM backup_logs WHERE backup_status = 'SUCCESS' ORDER BY backup_timestamp DESC;
SELECT plan_id, plan_name, recovery_strategy FROM disaster_recovery_plans;
SELECT * FROM backup_policies WHERE policy_name = 'DailyBackup'
SELECT policy_name, backup_frequency FROM backup_policies ORDER BY policy_id DESC
SELECT log_id, backup_status FROM backup_logs WHERE backup_timestamp >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM restore_points WHERE log_id IN (SELECT log_id FROM backup_logs WHERE backup_status = 'Successful')
SELECT plan_id, plan_name, contact_details FROM disaster_recovery_plans
SELECT * FROM BackupStrategies;
SELECT id, strategy_name, retention_policy FROM BackupStrategies ORDER BY strategy_name DESC;
SELECT recovery_plan_name, data_replication_strategy FROM DisasterRecovery WHERE failover_procedures LIKE '%DR%';
SELECT * FROM BackupRuns WHERE success = true ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT BackupLogs.id, BackupLogs.logs, BackupRuns.timestamp FROM BackupLogs JOIN BackupRuns ON BackupLogs.backup_run_id = BackupRuns.id;
SELECT * FROM BackupStrategies
SELECT strategy_name, backup_frequency FROM BackupStrategies ORDER BY strategy_name DESC
SELECT * FROM BackupRuns WHERE success = true
SELECT * FROM BackupStrategies WHERE retention_policy LIKE '%long-term%'

SELECT DisasterRecovery.recovery_plan_name, BackupLogs.logs FROM DisasterRecovery JOIN BackupRuns ON DisasterRecovery.id = BackupRuns.id JOIN BackupLogs ON BackupRuns.id = BackupLogs.backup_run_id ORDER BY DisasterRecovery.recovery_plan_name
